title: Mean 2012 - 2014
description:
The data being visualised here is the mean house price in England and Wales between 2012 and 2014. The height of each pixel represents the median price for properties sold in that area

The house price data was taken from https://data.gov.uk/dataset/price-paid-data. For more information, the source code that created this dataset is here https://github.com/jamesHargreaves12/DataVis_python.
